description.@en: You’re accustomed to staying out all night and all too often to finding yourself drinking everyone else underneath the table. When you are drunk, are you a friendly drunk or a mean drunk? You choose.

effect.@en: When you are Intoxicated, will you be a friendly drunk or a mean drunk? When you’re a friendly drunk, gain a +10 Base Chance to Charm Tests while Intoxicated. When you’re a mean drunk, gain a +10 Base Chance to Intimidate Tests while Intoxicated. You can make this choice every time you become Intoxicated.
